testcase.name: Pub App id and API URL
testcase.summary: Check Pub App id and API URL
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.

2. Open the app.

step.actions:
1. Install the app.

2. Open the app

3. Check Pub App id and API URL
step.expectedresults: Pub app id and API URL should be displayed on app.

testcase.name: Start button
testcase.summary: Check start button
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.

2. Open the app.

step.actions:
1. Install the app.

2. Open the app

3. Tap on Start button.
step.expectedresults:
1.Start button should be displayed on app.

2.After tapping on Start button SDK should get initialized.

testcase.name: Different tabs
testcase.summary:
Check below tabs on the bottom of app.

1.Vungle

2.Logs

3.Callback
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.

2. Open the app.

step.actions:
1. Install the app.

2. Open the app

3. Check Vungle,Logs,Callback tabs on the bottom of app.
step.expectedresults:
Check below tabs on the bottom of app.

1.Vungle

2.Logs

3.Callback.

testcase.name: SDK Parameters
testcase.summary:
Check below Vungle SDK parameters.

1.Log enabled

2.Winner notification

3. Auto Reload

4. User Consent status
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.

2. Open the app.

step.actions:
1.Open the app -> go to options

2.Check UI Parameter.
step.expectedresults:
Below parameters should be displayed on app UI.

1.Log enabled

2.Winner notification

3. Auto Reload

4. User Consent status

testcase.name: Winner notification
testcase.summary: Check winner notification flag.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.

2. Open the app.

step.actions:
1. Install the app.
2. Open the app
3. Switch ON/OFF "Winner notification" flag.
step.expectedresults:
1. "ON" & "Off" switch should displayed for Winner notification
2. User should be able to toggle between ON/OFF for winner notification.

testcase.name: Auto Reload
testcase.summary: Check Auto reload
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.

2. Open the app.

step.actions:
1. Install the app.
2.Open the app
3.Switch ON/OFF "Auto Reload " flag.
step.expectedresults:
1 "ON" & "Off" switch should be displayed for "Auto Reload"
2. User should be able to toggle between ON/OFF for Auto reload.
3.If user selects ON then next ad should auto reload.
4.If user selects OFF then next should not get download automatically.

testcase.name: Check for the Download icon after initialization.
testcase.summary: Check for the Download icon after initialization.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Set a charles proxy.

2. Install the app.

3. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Open the app.
2. Enter valid Pub App id.
3. Tap on the start button.
step.expectedresults:
1. Download button should display in front of the Placement Id if the Ad is not cached for the respective placement Id.
2. Play button should displayed in front of the Placement Id is Ad is cached for the respective placement Id.

testcase.name: SDK initialize successfully
testcase.summary: Initialize SDK with valid Pub App id.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Set a charles proxy.

2. Install the app.

3. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Open the app.
2. Enter valid Pub App Id.
3. Tap on start button.
step.expectedresults:
1. SDk should get initialize successfully with 'SDk initialize successfully' message on screen.
2. Get the sdkDidInitialize callback called.

testcase.name: SDK initialize with empty app id.
testcase.summary: Initialize SDK with blank pub app id.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Set a charles proxy.
2. Install the app.
3. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Open the app.
2. Do not enter pub app Id(leave pub app id blank).
3. Tap on start button.
step.expectedresults: Get the sdkFailedToInitialize callback called. with correct error information.

testcase.name: SDK initialize with invalid app id.
testcase.summary: Initialize SDK with invalid pub app id.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Set a charles proxy.

2. Install the app.

3. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Open the app.
2. Enter invalid Pub app id.
3. Tap on start button.
step.expectedresults:
1. Get the sdkFailedToInitialize callback called with correct error information.

2. Server will give a 400 http code(for config response) and some error information.

testcase.name: Initialize SDK on below old devices(non supportive OS)
testcase.summary: Initialize the SDk on old devices(non supportive OS)
testcase.preconditions:
1. Set a charles proxy.
2. Install the app.
3. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Open the app.
2. Enter Pub app id.
3. Tap on start button.
step.expectedresults: Get the sdkFailedToInitialize callback called with correct error information.

testcase.name: Initialize sdk with network disconnection
testcase.summary: Verify initialization of SDK with network disconnection
testcase.preconditions:
1. Set a charles proxy.
2. Install the app.
3. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Open the app.
2. Enter Pub app id.
3. Tap on start button.
4. Disconnect the wifi network during the initialization.
step.expectedresults:
1. The SDK will keep trying to access the /hbConfig with a predefined time intervals.
2. Get the sdkFailedToInitialize callback called until it reach to the maximum count(15).

testcase.name: Verify sdk refresh configuration(/hbConfig refresh timeout)
testcase.summary: Verify sdk refresh configuration(/hbConfig refresh timeout)
testcase.preconditions:
1. Set a charles proxy.
2. Install the app.
3. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Manipulate refresh parameter value in /hbConfig response.
2. Open the app.
3. Enter Pub app id.
4. Tap on start button.
step.expectedresults: 1.SDK should keep accessing /hbConfig by a predefined time interval(5 min)

testcase.name: Compatibility for iOS version
testcase.summary: Check Compatibility for iOS version 9+
testcase.preconditions:
1. Set a charles proxy.
2. Install the app.
3. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Open the app.
2. Enter Pub app id.
3. Tap on start button.
4. Load and play Ad.
step.expectedresults: Ad should play normally on all devices above OS version iOS 9.

testcase.name: Check for the Ad network status
testcase.summary: Check for the Ad network status
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.
2. Open the app.

step.actions:
1. Install the app.
2. Open the app
3. Enter Pub App id and API URL
4. Tap on Start tab.
step.expectedresults:
1.Ad should load successfully with different Ad Networks status such as
InMobi - Success
facebook - Fail
Vungle - Success
Admob - Fail

testcase.name: API hbConfig
testcase.summary: Check request payload of hbconfig API
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.
2. Open the app.
3. Initialize the app

step.actions:
1. Open the app.
2. Enter valid pub app Id.
3. Tap on start button.
4. Observe the hbConfig in charles.
step.expectedresults: hbConfig request should contain app info and device information.

testcase.name: API hbConfig .
testcase.summary: Check response payload of hbconfig API
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.
2. Open the app.
3. Initialize the app

step.actions:
1. Open the app.
2. Enter valid pub app Id.
3. Tap on start button.
4. Observe the hbConfig in charles.
step.expectedresults: hbConfig response should contain information about placements and End points.

testcase.name: Response payload of hbConfig
testcase.summary: To check response payload of hbConfig
testcase.preconditions:
1.Install the app.
2.Open the app.
3.Initialize the app

step.actions:
1) Install the App on device and set charles Proxy.
2) Manually initialise the App.
3) Observe response payload of hb config API in the charles Proxy.
step.expectedresults: hbconfig response payload should contains following parameters hb_enabled": true, "config": { "refresh_time": 0, "auction_timeout": 0 hb_endpoints" bid_endpoint": "string", "report_endpoint": "string", "log_endpoint": "string" "placements": [ { "reference_id": "string", "ad_networks":

testcase.name: User Agent of the build.
testcase.summary: Verify User agent of the build.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Set a charles proxy.
2. Install the app.
3. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Open the app.

2. Enter valid Pub app Id.

3. tap on start button.

4. Verify the user agent of the build in the header of APi.
step.expectedresults:
User agent should display properly.

eg. User-Agent - VungleHBS/0.9.0;native

testcase.name: Placement type parameter for a interstitial placement does not pass
testcase.summary: Parameter "placement_type" does not pass in the response of /v1/hbConfig for a interstitial placement
testcase.preconditions:
1、Parameter "placement_type" does not pass in the response of /v1/hbConfig

2、The placement is interstitial

step.actions:
1、Start Vungle Advanced Auction SDK successfulfly

2、Parameter "placement_type" does not pass in the response of /v1/hbConfig (we could use mock service or change qa environment ‘s MongoDB)

3、The placement is interstitial
step.expectedresults: The interstitial placement can load successfully

testcase.name: Placement type parameter for a interstitial placement is invalid
testcase.summary: Parameter "placement_type" is invalid in the response of /v1/hbConfig for a interstitial placement
testcase.preconditions:
1、Parameter "placement_type" is invalid in the response of /v1/hbConfig

2、The placement is interstitial

step.actions:
1、Start Vungle Advanced Auction SDK successfulfly

2、Parameter "placement_type" is invalid (for examle is 3) in the response of /v1/hbConfig (we could use mock service or change qa environment ‘s MongoDB) 3、The placement is interstitial
step.expectedresults: The interstitial placement is deemed as an invalid placement and can not load interstitial

testcase.name: Placement type is interstitial for a interstitial placement
testcase.summary: Parameter "placement_type" is interstitial in the response of /v1/hbConfig for a interstitial placement
testcase.preconditions:
1、Parameter "placement_type" is interstitial in the response of /v1/hbConfig

2、The placement is interstitial

step.actions:
1、Start Vungle Advanced Auction SDK successfulfly

2、Parameter "placement_type" is 0 in the response of /v1/hbConfig (we could use mock service or change qa environment ‘s MongoDB)

3、The placement is interstitial
step.expectedresults: The interstitial placement can load successfully

testcase.name: Placement is actually interstitial, but we use this placement as rewarded video
testcase.summary: Placement is actually interstitial, but we use this placement as rewarded video
testcase.preconditions: The placement is interstitial

step.actions:
1、Configure a interstitial placement

2、Start Vungle Advanced Auction SDK successfulfly

3、Use this interstitial placement to load rewarded video ads
step.expectedresults: The placement can not load successfully. Error "The placement type is mismatched" will be shown

testcase.name: Placement type parameter for a rewarded video placement does not pass
testcase.summary: Parameter "placement_type" does not pass in the response of /v1/hbConfig for a rewarded video placement
testcase.preconditions:
1、Parameter "placement_type" does not pass in the response of /v1/hbConfig

2、The placement is rewarded video

step.actions:
1、Start Vungle Advanced Auction SDK successfulfly

2、Parameter "placement_type" does not pass in the response of /v1/hbConfig (we could use mock service or change qa environment ‘s MongoDB)

3、The placement is rewarded video
step.expectedresults: The rewarded video placement can load successfully

testcase.name: Placement type parameter for a rewarded video placement is invalid
testcase.summary: Parameter "placement_type" is invalid in the response of /v1/hbConfig for a rewarded video placement
testcase.preconditions:
1、Parameter "placement_type" is invalid in the response of /v1/hbConfig

2、The placement is rewarded video

step.actions:
1、Start Vungle Advanced Auction SDK successfulfly

2、Parameter "placement_type" is invalid (for examle is 3) in the response of /v1/hbConfig (we could use mock service or change qa environment ‘s MongoDB) 3、The placement is rewarded video
step.expectedresults: The rewarded video placement is deemed as an invalid placement and can not load interstitial

testcase.name: Placement type is rewarded video for a rewarded video placement
testcase.summary: Parameter "placement_type" is rewarded video in the response of /v1/hbConfig for a rewarded video placement
testcase.preconditions:
1、Parameter "placement_type" is rewarded video in the response of /v1/hbConfig

2、The placement is rewarded video

step.actions:
1、Start Vungle Advanced Auction SDK successfulfly

2、Parameter "placement_type" is 1 in the response of /v1/hbConfig (we could use mock service or change qa environment ‘s MongoDB)

3、The placement is rewarded video
step.expectedresults: The rewarded video placement can load successfully

testcase.name: Load interstitial successfully after sdk initialized
testcase.summary: Call sdk api to load interstitial.
testcase.preconditions: Setup accounts correctly.(vungle, inmobi, admob, facebook, applovin, unity, mopub) The sdk is initialized successfully. (Get sdkDidInitialize called)

step.actions: Create an interstitial object with a valid placement id. Call api to load interstitial.
step.expectedresults: The InterstitialDidLoad callback called with each ad network. (The callback should be called in the main thread)

testcase.name: Load rewarded video ad successfully after sdk initalized
testcase.summary: Call sdk api to load rewarded video ad.
testcase.preconditions: Setup accounts correctly.(vungle, inmobi, admob, facebook, applovin, unity, mopub) The sdk is initalized successfully. (Get sdkDidInitialize called)

step.actions: Create an Interstitial object with a valid placement id. Call api to load interstitial.
step.expectedresults: The InterstitialDidLoad callback called with each ad network.

testcase.name: Load Interstitial Ad
testcase.summary: Load interstitial Ad
testcase.preconditions:
1. Set a charles proxy.
2. Install the app.
3. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Open the app.
2. Enter valid pub app id.
3. Tap on start button.
4. Tap on load button of 'Interstitial Ad'
step.expectedresults:
1. Interstitial Ad should get loaded successfully.
2. Ad network status should display according to the availability of Ads.
3. Callback 'InterestialDidLoad:withAdNetwork' should display in Callback tab with Ad network name.

testcase.name: Callback for load Interstitial Ad
testcase.summary: Callback for load Interstitial Ad
testcase.preconditions:
1. Set a charles proxy.
2. Install the app.
3. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Open the app.
2. Enter valid pub app id.
3. Tap on start button.
4. Tap on load button of 'Interstitial Ad'
5. Observe the callback on callback tab.
step.expectedresults: 1. Callback 'InterestialDidLoad:withAdNetwork' should display in Callback tab with Ad network name.

testcase.name: Logs for load Interstitial Ad
testcase.summary: Logs for load Interstitial Ad
testcase.preconditions:
1. Set a charles proxy.
2. Install the app.
3. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Open the app.
2. Enter valid pub app id.
3. Tap on start button.
4. Tap on load button of 'Interstitial Ad'
5. Observe the logs on log tab.
step.expectedresults:
1. Ad network name with bid token information should present in logs.
eg. Interstitial adapter[admob] did load, with bid info:(null)

testcase.name: Play Interstitial Ad
testcase.summary: Play Interstitial Ad
testcase.preconditions:
1. Set a charles proxy.
2. Install the app.
3. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Open the app.
2. Enter valid pub app id.
3. Tap on start button.
4. Tap on play button of 'Interstitial Ad'
step.expectedresults: 1. Interstitial Ad should play.

testcase.name: Callback for play Interstitial Ad
testcase.summary: Callback for play Interstitial Ad
testcase.preconditions:
1. Set a charles proxy.
2. Install the app.
3. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Open the app.
2. Enter valid pub app id.
3. Tap on start button.
4. Tap on play button of 'Interstitial Ad'
5. Observe the callback on callback tab.
step.expectedresults:
1. Callback 'Interest alDi Present' should display in Callback tab.
2. Winner name of the Ad network should present in the callback.
3. callback 'InterestialDidDismiss' should present after completion of Adplay and close the ad

testcase.name: Logs for Play Interstitial Ad
testcase.summary: Logs for Play Interstitial Ad
testcase.preconditions:
1. Set a charles proxy.
2. Install the app.
3. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Open the app.
2. Enter valid pub app id.
3. Tap on start button.
4. Tap on play button of 'Interstitial Ad'
5. Observe the logs on log tab.
step.expectedresults:
Following should display in logs.
1. Send play ad report successfully.
2. [vungle]adapterWillDismissInterestial
3. [vungle]adapterDidDismissinterestial

testcase.preconditions:

2. Install the app.
3. Initialize the app.

step.actions:

testcase.name: Play rewarded Ad
testcase.summary: Play rewarded Ad
testcase.preconditions:
1. Set a charles proxy.
2. Install the app.
3. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Open the app.
2. Enter valid pub app id.
3. Tap on start button.
4. Tap on Play button of 'rewarded Ad'
step.expectedresults:
1. Interstitial Ad should get loaded successfully.
2. Ad network status should display according to the availability of Ads.

testcase.name: Callback for play rewarded Ad
testcase.summary: Callback for play rewarded Ad
testcase.preconditions:
1. Set a charles proxy.
2. Install the app.
3. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Open the app.
2. Enter valid pub app id.
3. Tap on start button.
4. Tap on play button of 'rewarded Ad'
5. Observe the callback on callback tab.
step.expectedresults:
1. Callback 'rewardedVideoAdDidPresent' should display in Callback tab.
2. Winner name of the Ad network should present in the callback.
3. Callback 'rewardedVideoAd:didRewardUserwithReward' should prsent in callback tab after completion of the Ad view.
4. Callback 'rewardedVideoAdDidDismiss' should present after completion of Adplay and close the ad

step.actions:

2. Enter valid pub app id.
3. Tap on start button.
4. Tap on load button of 'Rewarded Ad'.
5. Tap on close button before Ad complete.
step.expectedresults: The didRewardUserWithReward call should NOT get called in callback.

testcase.name: logs
testcase.summary: Check if config api has logging parameter as enable
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.
2. Initialize the app.
3.Malformed Config API's response.
4.Put logging parameter as true

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.
2. Load the Ad
3.Play the Ad.
4. Check Charles/fiddler
step.expectedresults:
Following information should display in logs:
-Core process records, like initialization, loading ads / playing ads, network request / responses.
-Errors / Exceptions at runtime, which from HBS SDK itself or from ad network SDKs.

testcase.name: Ad network Token
testcase.summary: Verify Bid token in SDK log and report ad
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.
2. Open the app.

step.actions:
1. Install the app.
2. Open the app
3. add Pub App id and API URL
4. Click on Start button
5. After sucessfully load ad check winning ad network token value from logs
6. Play ad
step.expectedresults: Verify winning ad network token value in SDK log

testcase.name: SDK callbacks
testcase.summary: Check SDK callbacks for loadAd
testcase.preconditions: Play the Ad and observe the Listener Callbacks in Test App

step.actions:
1. Initialize the App

2. Play the Ad

3. After playing the Ad

4. Observe the listener callbacks for SDK callbacks for loadAd.
step.expectedresults:
Callbacks should display in listener callbacks on Test App.

Callbacks should display for every placement ID when user play Ad for it.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the App

2. Play the Ad

3. After playing the Ad

4. Observe the listener callbacks for SDK callbacks for loadAd.
step.expectedresults:
Callbacks should display in listener callbacks on Test App.

Callbacks should display for every placement ID when user play Ad for it.

testcase.name: /report of Interstitial Ad.
testcase.summary: Check /report for interstitial Ads with network connected.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Set a charles proxy.
2. Install the app.
3. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Open the App.
2. Enter pub App Id.
3. Tap on start button.
4. Load and play Interstitial Ads.
5. Observe the charles.
step.expectedresults:
1. /report API should fire in charles after the user tap on play button of Ad.
2. Check all the parameter in the /report should displayed with valid value(non negative value).
3. Callback and logs for respective Ads should displayed in Callback and Log tab respectively.

testcase.name: /report of Interstitial Ad..
testcase.summary: Check /report for interstitial Ads without network connected.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Set a charles proxy.
2. Install the app.
3. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Open the App.
2. Enter pub App Id.
3. Tap on start button.
4. Load Interstitial Ad
5. Disconnect the wifi and turn on airplane mode.
6. Observe the charles.
step.expectedresults:
1. /report API should not fire in charles after the user tap on play button of Ad.
2. /report API should display in charles if user turn on the wifi after Ad play.

testcase.name: /report of rewarded Ad.
testcase.summary: Check /report for rewarded Ads with network connected.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Set a charles proxy.
2. Install the app.
3. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Open the App.
2. Enter pub App Id.
3. Tap on start button.
4. Load and play rewarded Ads.
5. Observe the charles.
step.expectedresults:
1. /report API should fire in charles after the user tap on play button of Ad.
2. Check all the parameter in the /report should displayed with valid value(non negative value).
3. Callback and logs for respective Ads should displayed in Callback and Log tab respectively.

testcase.name: /report of Rewarded Ad
testcase.summary: Check /report for Rewarded Ads without network connected.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Set a charles proxy.
2. Install the app.
3. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Open the App.
2. Enter pub App Id.
3. Tap on start button.
4. Load rewarded Ad
5. Disconnect the wifi and turn on airplane mode.
6. Observe the charles.
step.expectedresults:
1. /report API should not fire in charles after the user tap on play button of Ad.
2. /report API should display in charles if user turn on the wifi after Ad play.

testcase.name: TPAT tracking should be called when mute or unmute(Only applicable for Vungle SDK )
testcase.summary: Check tpat tracking should be display in charles / fiddler when user mute/unmute ad video
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.
2. Open the app.
3. Initialize the app

step.actions:
1.Start Test app
2.Init SDK and play an ad
3.Tap on mute and unmute option
step.expectedresults: TPAT tracking should be display for mute and unmute action

testcase.name: TPAT tracking-should be called when a video is closed
testcase.summary: Check TPAT tracking-should be called when a video is closed
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.
2. Open the app.
3. Initialize the app

step.actions:
1.Start Test app
2.Init SDK and play an ad
3.While playing a video, close it
step.expectedresults: TPAT tracking should be called for close Ad

testcase.name: TPAT tracking-should be called at end card(Only applicable for Vungle SDK )
testcase.summary: Check TPAT tracking-should be called at end card
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.
2. Open the app.
3. Initialize the app

step.actions:
1.Start Test app

2.Init SDK and play an ad

3.Wait for end card displayed
step.expectedresults: TPAT tracking should be called for end card

testcase.name: ifa
testcase.summary: Check if "ifa" param is included in all API call from SDK
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.

2. Open the app.

3. Initialize the app

step.actions:
1) Install the App on device and set charles Proxy.

2) Manually initialise the App.

3) Load and play ad
step.expectedresults: "ifa" is included with valid data

testcase.name: Send unsent play ad report when sdk initialized
testcase.summary:
There are some play ad report failed to sent, include interstititial and rewarded video ad.
The network is connected.
testcase.preconditions: Initialize sdk successfully.

step.actions:
1. Open the App.
2. Enter pub App Id.
3. Tap on start button.
4. Load Interstitial/Rewarded  Ad
5. Observe the charles.
step.expectedresults: The unsent play report should be sent by the order they generated.

testcase.name: Bid strategy is auction for a interstitial placement
testcase.summary: Parameter "bid_strategy" is auction in the response of /v1/hbConfig for a interstitial placement
testcase.preconditions:
1. Parameter "bid_strategy" is auction in the response of /v1/hbConfig

2. The placement is interstitial

step.actions:
1. Start Vungle Advanced Auction SDK successfulfly

2. Parameter "bid_strategy" is 0 in the response of /v1/hbConfig (we could use mock service or change qa environment ‘s MongoDB)

3. The placement is interstitial
step.expectedresults: The first ad network of /bid response should be played

testcase.name: Bid strategy is waterfall for a interstitial placement
testcase.summary: Parameter "bid_strategy" is waterfall in the response of /v1/hbConfig for a interstitial placement
testcase.preconditions:
1. Parameter "bid_strategy" is waterfall in the response of /v1/hbConfig

2. The placement is interstitial

step.actions:
1. Start Vungle Advanced Auction SDK successfully

2. Parameter "bid_strategy" is 1 in the response of /v1/hbConfig (we could use mock service or change qa environment ‘s MongoDB)

3. The placement is interstitial
step.expectedresults: The /bid request will not call The first ad network of ad networks array returned in the /v1/hbConfig response should be played

testcase.name: Bid strategy parameter does not pass for a interstitial placement
testcase.summary: Parameter "bid_strategy" does not pass in the response of /v1/hbConfig for a interstitial placement
testcase.preconditions:
1. Parameter "bid_strategy" does not pass in the response of /v1/hbConfig

2. The placement is interstitial

step.actions:
1. Start Vungle Advanced Auction SDK successfully

2. Parameter "bid_strategy" does not pass in the response of /v1/hbConfig (we could use mock service or change qa environment ‘s MongoDB)

3. The placement is interstitial
step.expectedresults: The first ad network of /bid response should be played

testcase.name: Bid strategy parameter is invalid for a interstitial placement
testcase.summary: Parameter "bid_strategy" is invalid in the response of /v1/hbConfig for a interstitial placement
testcase.preconditions:
1. Parameter "bid_strategy" is invalid in the response of /v1/hbConfig

2. The placement is interstitial

step.actions:
1. Start Vungle Advanced Auction SDK successfully

2. Parameter "bid_strategy" is invalid(for example is -1 or 2) in the response of /v1/hbConfig (we could use mock service or change qa environment ‘s MongoDB)

3. The placement is interstitial
step.expectedresults: The first ad network of /bid response should be played

step.actions:

2. Parameter "bid_strategy" is 0 in the response of /v1/hbConfig (we could use mock service or change qa environment ‘s MongoDB)

3. The placement is rewarded video

testcase.name: Overwrite rewards parameters with valid value
testcase.summary: Parameter "reward_override" is valid in the response of /v1/hbConfig for a rewarded video placement
testcase.preconditions:
1. Parameter "reward_override" is valid in the response of /v1/hbConfig

2. The placement is rewarded video

step.actions:
1. Start Vungle Advanced Auction SDK successfully

2. Parameter "reward_override" is valid with correct value of "item" and "amount" in the response of /v1/hbConfig (we could use mock service or change qa environment ‘s MongoDB)

3. The placement is rewarded video
step.expectedresults: The reward could be override successfully with correct type and amount after watching the rewarded video completely

testcase.name: Overwrite rewards parameters does not pass
testcase.summary: Parameter "reward_override" does not pass in the response of /v1/hbConfig for a rewarded video placement
testcase.preconditions:
1. Parameter "reward_override" does not pass in the response of /v1/hbConfig

2. The placement is rewarded video

step.actions:
1. Start Vungle Advanced Auction SDK successfully

2. Parameter "reward_override" does not pass in the response of /v1/hbConfig (we could use mock service or change qa environment ‘s MongoDB)

3. The placement is rewarded video
step.expectedresults: The reward will use the configuration of ad network that played the ad after watching the rewarded video completely

testcase.name: Overwrite rewards parameters does not pass "item" parameter
testcase.summary: Parameter "item" of "reward_override" does not pass in the response of /v1/hbConfig for a rewarded video placement
testcase.preconditions:
1. Parameter "item" of "reward_override" does not pass in the response of /v1/hbConfig

2. The placement is rewarded video

step.actions:
1. Start Vungle Advanced Auction SDK successfully

2. Parameter "item" of "reward_override" does not pass in the response of /v1/hbConfig (we could use mock service or change qa environment ‘s MongoDB)

3. The placement is rewarded video
step.expectedresults: The reward will use the configuration of ad network that played the ad after watching the rewarded video completely; The "amount" paramter does not take effect

testcase.name: Overwrite rewards parameters does not pass "amount" parameter
testcase.summary: Parameter "amount" of "reward_override" does not pass in the response of /v1/hbConfig for a rewarded video placement
testcase.preconditions:
1. Parameter "amount" of "reward_override" does not pass in the response of /v1/hbConfig

2. The placement is rewarded video

step.actions:
1. Start Vungle Advanced Auction SDK successfully

2. Parameter "amount" of "reward_override" does not pass in the response of /v1/hbConfig (we could use mock service or change qa environment ‘s MongoDB)

3. The placement is rewarded video
step.expectedresults: The reward will use the configuration of ad network that played the ad after watching the rewarded video completely; The "item" paramter does not take effect

testcase.name: "Amount" parameter of Overwrite rewards parameters is negative
testcase.summary: Parameter "amount" of "reward_override" is negative in the response of /v1/hbConfig for a rewarded video placement
testcase.preconditions:
1. Parameter "amount" of "reward_override" is negative in the response of /v1/hbConfig

2. The placement is rewarded video

step.actions:
1. Start Vungle Advanced Auction SDK successfully

2. Parameter "amount" of "reward_override" is negative in the response of /v1/hbConfig (we could use mock service or change qa environment ‘s MongoDB)

3. The placement is rewarded video
step.expectedresults: The reward could be override successfully with the passed type and amount after watching the rewarded video completely

testcase.name: User consent status is unknown in non EU countries.
testcase.summary: User consent status is unknown in non EU countries.
testcase.preconditions: Device IP is a non EU country IP. User consent status is unknown.

step.actions:
1. Change device IP to a non EU country IP.
2. In TestApp, choose “User consent status" to unknown (Default)
3. Start Vungle Advanced Auction SDK.
step.expectedresults:
1. In /v1/hbConfig request, parameter ”consent_status“ is unknown: "user": { "gdpr": { "consent_source": "publisher", "consent_status": "unknown", "consent_timestamp": 0 } }
2. In /v1/hbConfig response, parameter "is_country_data_protected" is false "gdpr": { "is_country_data_protected": false } }

testcase.name: User consent status is accepted in non EU countries.
testcase.summary: User consent status is accepted in non EU countries.
testcase.preconditions: Device IP is a non EU country IP. User consetn status is accepted.

step.actions:
1. Change device IP to a non EU country IP.
2. In TestApp, choose  “User consent status" to accepted
3. Start Vungle Advanced Auction SDK.
step.expectedresults:
1. In /v1/hbConfig request,   parameter
”consent_status“ is opted_in:
"user": {
                "gdpr": {
                        "consent_source": "publisher",
                        "consent_status": "opted_in",
                        "consent_timestamp": 1536732869
                }
        }
2. In  /v1/hbConfig  response,
parameter "is_country_data_protected"  is false
"gdpr": {
                "is_country_data_protected": false
        }
}

testcase.name: User consent status is denied in non EU countries.
testcase.summary: User consent status is denied in non EU countries.
testcase.preconditions: Device IP is a non EU country IP. User consent status is denied.

step.actions:
1. Change device IP to a non EU country IP.
2. In TestApp, choose  “User consent status"
to denied
3. Start Vungle Advanced Auction SDK.
step.expectedresults:
1. In /v1/hbConfig request,   parameter
”consent_status“ is opted_out:
"user": {
"gdpr": {
"consent_source": "publisher",
"consent_status": "opted_out",
"consent_timestamp": 1536733015
}
}

2. In  /v1/hbConfig  response,
parameter "is_country_data_protected"  is false
"gdpr": {
                "is_country_data_protected": false
        }
}

testcase.name: User consent status is unknown in EU countries.
testcase.summary: User consent status is unknown in EU countries.
testcase.preconditions: Device IP is a EU country IP. User consetn status is unknown.

step.actions:
1. Change device IP to a EU country IP
(We could use Astrill to switch to Germany IP).
2. In TestApp, choose  “User consent status"
to unknown （Default）
3. Start Vungle Advanced Auction SDK.
step.expectedresults:
1. In /v1/hbConfig request,   parameter
”consent_status“ is unknown:
"user": {
                "gdpr": {
                        "consent_source": "publisher",
                        "consent_status": "unknown",
                        "consent_timestamp": 0
                }
        }
2. In  /v1/hbConfig  response,
parameter "is_country_data_protected"  is false
"gdpr": {
                "is_country_data_protected": true
        }

testcase.name: User consent status is accepted in EU countries.
testcase.summary: User consent status is accepted in EU countries.
testcase.preconditions: Device IP is a EU country IP. User consetn status is accepted.

step.actions:
1. Change device IP to a EU country IP
(We could use Astrill to switch to Germany IP).
2. In TestApp, choose  “User consent status"
to accepted
3. Start Vungle Advanced Auction SDK.
step.expectedresults:
1. In /v1/hbConfig request,   parameter
”consent_status“ is opted_in:
"user": {
                "gdpr": {
                        "consent_source": "publisher",
                        "consent_status": "opted_in",
                        "consent_timestamp": 1536732869
                }
        }
2. In  /v1/hbConfig  response,
parameter "is_country_data_protected"  is false
"gdpr": {
                "is_country_data_protected": true
        }

testcase.name: User consent status is denied in EU countries.
testcase.summary: User consent status is denied in EU countries.
testcase.preconditions: Device IP is a EU country IP. User consent status is denied.

step.actions:

(We could use Astrill to switch to Germany IP).

to denied
3. Start Vungle Advanced Auction SDK.
step.expectedresults:

”consent_status“ is opted_out:
"user": {

                        "consent_status": "opted_out",
                        "consent_timestamp": 1536733015

        }
2. In  /v1/hbConfig  response,
parameter "is_country_data_protected"  is false
"gdpr": {

        }

testcase.name: Log function enabled
testcase.summary: Log function enabled
testcase.preconditions: Parameter "logging" is enabled in the response of /v1/hbConfig

step.actions:
1. Start Vungle Advanced Auction SDK successfulfly
2. Parameter  "logging" is enabled in the response of  /v1/hbConfig
"logging": {
                "enabled": true
        },
step.expectedresults: Vungle Advanced Auction SDK will send the log items to the log endpoint(For qa environment is https://qa-hb.api.vungle.com/v1/logging) ; Each field of metadata in every log item is correct and does not have raw data

testcase.name: Log function disabled
testcase.summary: Log function disabled
testcase.preconditions: Parameter "logging" is disabled in the response of /v1/hbConfig

step.actions:
1. Start Vungle Advanced Auction SDK successfulfly
2. Parameter  "logging" is disabled in the response of  /v1/hbConfig
"logging": {
                "enabled": false
        },
step.expectedresults: Vungle Advanced Auction SDK will not send the log items to the log endpoint(For qa environment is https://qa-hb.api.vungle.com/v1/logging)
